Arts and Leisure

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

We can find most books, even if you cannot see them on the shelves of your local library. Our Inter Library Loans service enables us to look nationwide. Just ask a member of staff to assist.

We can also request photocopies from serials and periodicals. Because of copyright restrictions we cannot request a photocopy of more than one article from the same volume. We do sometimes request the whole volume in this case for you to look at.

The more details you provide, the easier and quicker we can supply it.

If the item you want is available from a enter council name library but out on loan to another borrower, then we can reserve it for you.

Alternatively you can email us to reserve an item, use our contact details above.
